instructions: FIDELIS October 10, 2011 at 7:13 am Hello, the links below show you how to backup/restore by using ovi suite: http://europe.nokia.com/support/product-support/nokia-ovi-suite/howto/synchronise-and-back-up-your-information/back-up-and-restore-your-information http://support.ovi.com/osc/en_GB/service/ovi_on_your_computer/howto/support-suite-syncing-and-backing-up-your-content.dita#articlesupport-suite-syncing-and-backing-up-your-content-back-up-and-restore-your-content.dita The following link, shows how-to's with regards to using Nokia Ovi Suite: http://support.ovi.com/osc/en_GB/service/ovi_on_your_computer/howto/support-suite-syncing-and-backing-up-your-content-back-up-and-restore-your-content.dita Jay October 9, 2011 at 4:53 pm it will be the same as you made a backup...select a file from the same tool. Nokia Ovi Suite, click Tools > Restore . Under Restore content from, select the backup file you want to restore. The default file for each phone is the most recent backup So either choose from the list, or select any particular file from browse. Then, select the content types you want to restore from the file. Click Start to begin restoring content to your phone. Do not disconnect or switch off your phone, or close Nokia Ovi Suite while restoring content. If you need to stop the restore, click Stop. Nokia Ovi Suite will reach a safe stop point and will then stop the restore. Click Finish
